title:
Dreaming With
The Archives
summary: Free public AR art exhibition transforming Brooklyn Bridge Park into a digital monument
description: Produced by Kinfolk Tech, Dreaming with the Archives was a free public AR art exhibition that transformed Brooklyn Bridge Park into a digital monument to layered histories of Brooklyn and the African diaspora. Launched on Juneteenth 2025, the experience featured site-specific works by leading artists and marked the beginning of a year-long, multi-city initiative reimagining public space and collective memory through art and technology.
